column4: I have Ubuntu 8.04, when I insert a DVD-rw I get this error: http://pastebin.com/m30eb693f. My /etc/fstab is here: http://pastebin.com/m13efad1e
Could it be that my fstab is not correct?
fstab looks okay to me. Does that happen with every dvd?
it does not happen when I insert, for example, a movie into the DVD player. It only happens with a blank DVD-rw.
